Text:
Sorry about the missing album title. The name of this torrent should have read "Smashing Pumpkins, the - Machina II/The Friends & Enemies of Modern Music". Don't know why the name didn't appear as intended.

Btw; If you'd like more information about this album and its background story, check out Wikipedia [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MACHINA_II/The_Friends_%26_Enemies_of_Modern_Music].

Contains file on a server no wait time
